h1_title: King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince
h2_title: Where to Find the King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince
content: From the Sandgate Village Area, head up and to the right from the Village Entrance Shrine, right from the sealed town gate to find a Rat Governor and two two-headed Rat Captains guarding a low valley. To their right is a large door you can open, triggering the boss fight.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'King_of_Flowing_Sands_and_Second_Rat_Prince.md', within the main section titled 'King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince'.
The content is as follows:
From the Sandgate Village Area, head up and to the right from the Village Entrance Shrine, right from the sealed town gate to find a Rat Governor and two two-headed Rat Captains guarding a low valley. To their right is a large door you can open, triggering the boss fight.
